short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for Stardex ATS + CRM! Easily add candidates to your ATS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stardex ATS + CRM extensions allows users to easily add candidate profiles to their job pipelines with one click! We also surface data on candidate profiles on sites like LinkedIn.
